i thoroughly enjoyed this game if you are the sort of player who likes to explore every inch of the map before moving the plot along this game is definitely for you   the puzzles are varied and fresh except for lock picking and i really liked that the game includes as skip puzzle mechanic if you just cant work it out i had to use it a couple of times because the old code seized up the icebucket puzzles just completely glitched out

interactive sherlock holmes does a great job of telling you a fun story while wanting to solve the mystery while also keeping you engaged with several mini games and fun dialogue   if you want an action packed sherlock holmes this isnt that but if you like the detective side of things you will enjoy this plus it goes on sale a lot  810
